simpledrawer.name: SimpleDrawer
simpledrawer.tellraw_christmas: Christmas event is enable until the next server restart / reload
simpledrawer.place_error: You can't place the drawer here
simpledrawer.input_error: This item isn't allowed in the drawer
simpledrawer.guide.heavy_workbench: The Heavy Workbench is a crafting table for SimpleDrawer and other data packs.
simpledrawer.guide.new_drawer: The drawer is a block that can store 1 item type but up to 256 items.
simpledrawer.guide.double_new_drawer: Same as the drawer but can store 2 different item types.
simpledrawer.guide.quadruple_new_drawer: Same as the drawer but can store 4 different item types.
simpledrawer.guide.upgrade:
An upgrade is an item that can be applied to the drawer to modify its behavior. Apply them by sneaking + left clicking on the drawer.
 The application order of storage upgrades need to be the same as the guide.
simpledrawer.guide.downgrade_wrench: Downgrade the drawer by one tier by a sneak left click on the drawer.
simpledrawer.guide.first_page: This guide show all the blocks and items added by SimpleDrawer, with their respectives recipes.
simpledrawer.guide.drawers.inserting: Just right click on the drawer with the item you want to insert. Sneaking will insert a full stack and with an empty hand you will insert all items from your inventory.
simpledrawer.guide.drawers.extracting:
Just left click on the drawer to extract one item. Sneaking will extract a full stack.

PS : During Christmas, you can craft drawers with Packed Ice.
simpledrawer.outdated_drawer: This drawer is outdated, it will continue to work fine.
simpledrawer.outdated_drawer_craft: You can update it by putting it in a Heavy Workbench.
simpledrawer.guide.compacting_new_drawer: This drawer display block, ingot and nugget form of the stored item.
simpledrawer.guide.update_button:
Click here to update the guide
Current guide version : %s
simpledrawer.update_guide_fail: There is no guide to update
simpledrawer.guide.project_pages: Check all official pages of the project
simpledrawer.advancement.root.title: SimpleDrawer
simpledrawer.advancement.root.descriptio: Open the SimpleDrawer guide to know how to craft drawers.
simpledrawer.advancement.filled.title: Fill a %s drawer
simpledrawer.advancement.filled.descript: Use the max capacity of a %s drawer
simpledrawer.advancement.upgrade.descrip: Use a %s upgrade on a drawer
